channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: RPI Spring Career Fair Location Change
item.description: Attention RPI Students! The RPI Spring Career Fair has been moved to ECAV. Shuttles will depart from Union horseshoe starting at 10:30am. Students may also park in B or E lot. Please register in Handshake for any updates.
item.author: Students

item.title: Transfer Student Coffee Hour
item.description: Date: Tuesday, February 10, 2026 8:30 AM - 10:00 AM - Transfer Student Coffee Hour
item.author: Students

item.title: Upcoming closures in Shuttle services
item.description: Friendly reminder that shuttles do not operate on holidays or during University closures. In observance of Presidents Day (February 16) and Spring Break (February 28–March 7), shuttles will not be running. Please plan accordingly.
item.author: Community

item.title: Webinar Friday February 13: Webex Event Training
item.description: Hosting a campus event or supporting a student webinar? Join a hands-on Webex Event Training Webinar, part of the MMS Collaboration Software Training series. Register now for this webinar presented via Webex on Friday February 13 from 11am-12pm: https://rensselaer.webex.com/webappng/sites/rensselaer/webinar/webinarSeries/register/783d951c6ab8482e9198a7bd6075a700 Learn the basics of Webex Event hosting, with demonstration and Q&A, along with new features recently added to the hosting platform.
item.author: Community

item.title: Children of Men
item.description:
Tuesday / February 10, 2026 at 7:00 pm When infertility threatens mankind with extinction and the last child born has perished, a disillusioned bureaucrat (Clive Owen) becomes the unlikely champion in the fight for the survival of Earth’s population; He must face down his own demons and protect the planet’s last remaining hope from danger. Presented by UPAC Film/Video Directed by Alfonso Cuarón

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
